reviews.review: Just too many hackers and Valve doesn't seem to care!  I think a pay for play would reduce hackers, at least on that side of the game.  Even a few dollars would deter most hackers.
pogne toujours des cheaters prend 20 minutes trouver une partie vraiment une maniere inutile de depenser son argent
ruslar ve toxic türkler olmasa iyi
It is a good game if you have a good trust factor
O jogo é top, porém faz algumas atualizações que nos impede de ter o melhor desempenho.
Hagan servers en argentina, es mucho lidiar con los toxicos y con el mal ping es horrible jugar asi, el juego esta re bien hecho :) y hice los mejores amigos ahi
Fun game as long as no one cheats :)
Todo bonito hasta NOVA 2, de ahi en adelante, busca un team, sino ahí te vas a quedar...

This is the worst game i have ever had the misfortune to install and play. The physics is broken, the players are toxic and it feels like the developers want u and ur family to die in agony. I would not recommend spending even a minute in this game as it is a complete waste of ur time and brain cells. Good luck and dont tell me i didnt warn u.
Jogo que atravessa gerações, e que nos traz muito prazer em jogá-lo, aguardando chegar a source 2 ajuda a gente ai Valve!
its bad but....... yea its just bad xD :(
Estressante as vezes? Sim! Mas é divertido, haha!

Well, the game's sick itself.

Takes time and a lot of practice to "get somewhere"

But, recommended!
best shooter out there but you have to put in the time to actually get good
Very good game, it is very fun
ÇOK GÜZEL DEMEME BİLE GEREK YOK
this game is full of dics, and is so fucking good at the same time. i want a big black nigga ball

i highgly recomend this gmae fro anynoe who wloud like to be invovled in a very6 very nice comunity. the ppl who lpay the gmae in indepndent mathmaking will not be disapointed, especialy in silver. teamates are big brian and skiled.
csgo Free estragou o jogo todo, +, Anticheat n vale um corno
Melhor Fps. O problema com os hacker é resolvido se começar a jogar apenas plataformas terceirizadas do jogo, com GamersbClub e Faceit.
Jogo top de mais, tem mapas novos falta algumas armas, mas o jogo ta bom.
CS é o melhor jogo do planeta, no cry

After 3016 hours of playing, I finally sold all my items and deleted the game. Why? One word: Cheaters. In 1500 mm matches, there were 486 cheaters (later vac banned). I cannot imagine cheaters didnt get caught. Just delete it and play cod, r6 etc or just don't play competitive and buy yourself good action role-playing games.
Bom jogo pra bater a cabeça na parede de tanta raiva por causa dos cheaters
adrenalina pura.. mas ta  infestado de hack
it was really good then uh ohhhhhh stinkyyyyy
Too many hackers in this game. More measures should be taken to counter hacks.
Jogabilidade muito boa e um bom cenário competitivo
Fun game to mess around with your friends. Even if they only have a laptop. Tons of fun had here. Don't play if you tilt tho

The developers clearly do not care about this game, its full of cheaters and smurfs, the interactions are almost always toxic, and the servers are garbage, if i could get back all the money i put into this game over the years that would be great, fuck valve, money hungry fucking vermin.

Buen juego aunque si me tomo unas cuantas horas para empezarle a agarrar mas o menos, eso si, no se metan al competitivo hasta que no sepan jugar ahi mas o menos, yo me meti para que me emparejara con gente mala como yo pero nada de eso, me metia con gente bien buena
